channel.title: [VB6] Getting text out of a txt file
channel.description: Im making something where you like put a url in a txt file then the webbrowser goes there, i just need to know how to get the text out of the file..

item.title: [VB6] Getting text out of a txt file
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

In VB2005 it’s

IO.File.ReadAllText("mydrivedood:\mydirectorydood\myfiledood.txt");

Like:

Dim con As String con = IO.File.ReadAllText(filenameanddirectoryox.Text)
Try seeing a similar function or sub in vb6.

Read full topic
item.source: [VB6] Getting text out of a txt file
